website_summaries.verdict: This L.O.L. Surprise! set is a great addition for young collectors, as it has interesting accessories and is a limited edition.
pros: Comes with two dolls - a big doll and a Lil Sister - and is a limited edition set
Includes a "fizz" seashell that kids love
Comes in an attractive "pearl ball" case
cons: All sets in this series have the same dolls

customer_reviews.title: A little overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these but I thought this one was overpriced and overrated. You only get 2 dolls in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: Loving them!
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping, everything came as described! I also am thankful for Amazon helping me right away when my package was lost... Yes, these doll are very Expensive but are also very cute! I think it's all worth it... What else you expect from l.o.l. surprise dolls?!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lena Bunni

customer_reviews.title: Price went up from when I purchased a month ago
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3yo! Very pleased as she is obsessed with lol dolls.. I paid 29.99 .. got on to order again .. one for my niece and the price has jumped up! Double the price! Which I won’t pay ! These are not random.. the same doll is in all of the pearl style purple ball.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PUT IN BATHTUB WITH CHILD!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great my daughter loves it so that's why its getting great review but it clearly sates on the side not intended for bathtub use and the reason why is because one the chemicals in this is not the same in bath bombs and 2 it stains big time. My hands are still pink and purple! Other then that great toys my daughter loved opening all the little stuff I just wouldn't let her touch the shell until it full unfizzed and I dried it!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: They arrived the second go round
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoyed getting the dolls inside ; however, shes 9 and knows that her bath bomb should fizz up and hers broke apart with several holes in it . The other teal colored one worked perfectly fine . Overall the girls are happy just wish her bath bomb was fully effective
customer_reviews.author: Keeyana

customer_reviews.title: Dyed my child purple!
customer_reviews.text: $30 for two small dolls is kind of a joke. Also, the clamshell thing that you dissolve in water not only dyed my wood table and our clothing/anything it came in contact with purple, but it also dyed my child purple. She had school photos the next day. The purple wouldn’t come off. Also, there is no attention to detail with this product. The dissolve thing wasn’t scented (it actually smelled AWFUL) and it didn’t have any shimmer or glitter or anything to it, which you would assume it would since it’s mermaid/pearl themed. The whole thing seemed very cheap, like they didn’t even try.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: The dolls are beautiful and real
customer_reviews.text: The dolls are beautiful and real. I’ve read some reviews about people doubting the authenticity of the dolls, but these are definitely not those. My daughter is a big fan of LOL dolls and she’s very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: My sister ordered this exact LOL surprise ball from Amazon. It has the 2 “precious” dolls in it. I ordered one to give to her for Christmas and it’s the SAME dolls 😒 (there is a piece of paper inside telling you what dolls it is). My MIL ordered from amazon this exact one and yet again it is the SAME dolls. Very disappointed!!!! Now she has 3 and doesn’t even want the other 2 but we can’t return because the outside packaging has been removed. $60 wasted. Shame on you amazon for selling the SAME LOL surprise ball to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool and fun experience
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old was very entertained! The whole experience lasted about 5 mins. This does stain hands slightly but not a big deal. It was fun all around. From getting the water ready, to dipping the shell, to peeling it apart and then opening it to find the surprise! Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because I can’t seem to get a different ethnicity in these products. Definitely recommend!!!!!!! Keeps the kids busy for a little while longer than the opening of the L.O.L balls.
customer_reviews.author: g.e

customer_reviews.title: underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a little friend of mine who asked for this for a birthday gift. There was a shell that needed to be soaked in water until the cover fizzled off, cool for about 2 minutes. Inside the shell was a 2" +/- doll and a mini baby. There were little balls with clothing inside. Totally underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: PFTN

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it, but the cost for what these are...
customer_reviews.text: I will say my daughter loves these things. But as the one buying it, I can tell you they are not worth the money. Basically a bunch of really cheap items in a surprise case and then overpriced. The contents, were a tiny doll, a bath bomb, some stickers and a few doll accessories. $10 or less worth of bargain bin junk. I'm sure many parents who bought these were as unsure as I was, about these. All i knew was the company made some small collectible doll sets and toys. For the size of the container I expected several dolls and toys, and its majority packaging inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arod84

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!! Happy kid!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall!!! The best toy ever!! My two youngest Love them!! She was very happy to see Prescious!! Fast! Precise! Awesome experience!! Exactly the one she wanted!!! S/n: I was very surprised to see a very clearly labeled "Prescious" tag visible thru case😂😂! Awesome for parents but may ruin the "surprise" aspect abit for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Danica R

customer_reviews.title: The best (and favorite) LOL Surprise Doll!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! My daughter received a variety of lol surprise dolls for Christmas. This was by far her favorite. After you open the case, you receive a huge ‘bath bomb’ type clam shell which holds the doll and accessories. We put it in a bucket and water (so I didn’t send all the product down my drain) and it was sooo cool! The clam fizzes and bubbles tons of colors. Once it has dissolved there are many different packages to open. She also received a doll that color changes in the water which is her favorite LOL doll. Overall a fun and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not that wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It was cute, I guess. It was messy tho. And a little boring for the kids to just sit, watch and wait for the fiz to melt so they could touch it. They should have made the fiz part into a bath bomb. Now that would be cool. The way it is now is you put it in a bowl of water and wait for 45 minutes until the fiz stops and you can get to the doll. It was pricey but the granddaughter liked it. I will not buy an LOL anything again. These things are stupid and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: W.L. Glatt

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: She was L.O.L Surprised, at her 7th Surprise birthday party and the excitement on her face, the double surprise made my day! People say they are over commercialized and it is so much plastic but whatever! She unwrapped all that plastic and had a blast and I picked it all up too! She liked that the hair changed colors and made them little beds to sleep with her. It really took us 30-45 minutes to do it all so it was worth it! All of them had toys and were not duplicate.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Short lived and messy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged me for this, but ultimately, the fun part for her was so short lived and messy I am not sure if it was worth the cost. You do something similar to a bath bomb to get to the "pearl" but it left one of my bowls stained and once the "fun" was over, I haven't seen my daughter play with is since. Good quality product, just not likely something I will purchase again since it was so expensive compared to the smaller options.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Says

customer_reviews.title: 30 dollars for two very tiny dolls, what a rip off
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has always wanted LOL dolls so I got her a small one to check them out and she loved it, even though it was very expensive for what it is. But I was told the bigger the LOL case, the bigger the doll. Not true. 30 dollars for a case with two very tiny plastic dolls. She had fun with the bath bomb but after that, the clothes didn't really fit the dolls well and I can't imagine why anyone would charge more than 10 or 12 bucks for what it is. What a rip off! Never getting them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: This gift was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I had no idea what LOL was when my sister gave me the gift idea for my niece. Once she opened it her eyes lit up and we had to dissolve the bath-balls immediately. It was cool to fill the container up with water and watch the dolls appear, she was very happy. This is a good gift for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Different dolls than The Blue one
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is obsessed with LOL dolls; so glad that this is a reasonable price for a water bomb and a couple of dolls. Love these because my granddaughter name is Pearl. I purchased the blue one for Easter and this Pink one for her birthday which was in August. Love that it’s different from the blue one and it was something new, needless to say she was thrilled and loves the seashells that are inside with the dolls.
customer_reviews.author: D. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y.o. loved it!!! It was a bit bigger than I expected but that added to the excitement for my daughter. The shell was the best part - for her and for me, lol - it was like a bath bomb but since we don't have a bathtub- we used the purple container and 'opened' it in the bathroom. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved this, very cute, but a little underwhelming for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had no complaints when it came to this set, but I'd say for the price and what was included I'm not a very happy mama. I will say though, the fizz shell was a nice little touch, seeing it dissolve and the colors. But, not enough love (on my behalf) to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for each daughter. It was a huge rip off. They got the exact same thing. One of their friends alerted me they are all the same. Not to mention the egregious amount of plastic packaging. In a time when we should all reduce our plastic dependency toy companies are ramping up their complete disregard for the environment. The tiny pieces will be lost in a days time. $80 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: My girls loved receiving this as a surprise
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved receiving this as a surprise, since they are huge LOL fans! Something we don't see in the stores
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: LOL Surprise dolls
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with my nieces for Christmas. I can't say I understand the excitement, but it did a great job of meeting their expectations! Price was competitive and stable (unusually for Amazon!). Perfect gift for a 8-10 year old girl. The quality isn't anything special, but you pay for the surprise aspect.
customer_reviews.author: bvanderpol

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: It came in a bathbomb type shell with warnings it wasn't for bathing. It stained my sink. The toys inside were very small and cheaply made. Way way over priced. It should hsbe been abought $10 and I am being generous. Very disappointed in this product. I suggest you save your money.
customer_reviews.author: starsAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't figure out the hype
customer_reviews.text: The grand girls loved this toy, but I honestly can't figure out why it is such a popular toy. My daughter said that the four year old couldn't unwrap it by herself. Oh well, I was a good grandma and purchased these (2 of them) for them. I won't do it again. I feel the toy is overpriced for the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy D. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Cool exterior
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas. I have no idea what it really is, but when it came, the exterior intrigued me as it was big and round, very pink and sparkly. My niece seemed very excited to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: LooLoo

customer_reviews.title: Sigh.
customer_reviews.text: I know these little dolls are all the rage right now, so I bought this. It's not the first I've purchased, though I always feel ripped off when she opens them. That said, my kid couldn't be happier with these little dolls. I guess it's the price which bothers me, what could these possibly cost to make?
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LOL dolls so of course she loves this product. It’s comes with a couple outfits and then inside is the big sister and little sister. The seashell didn’t erupt in fizz when put in water so that’s why I gave it 4 stars. My daughter was excited to see that part so it was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 7 yr old daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of LOL's as all that wrapping and especially the sand thing ends up everywhere - clogging the sink, rubbed into tile grout or carpet - just a mess. Daughter got so many LOL stuff for Christmas - took her F O R E V E R to get done with the unwrapping. And the sand mess - gez.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Reid

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. It was disguised as a bath bomb but beneath the bath bomb was the LOL surprise doll container.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced...not as big as thought
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the small side for the price you pay and based on the visuals you get in the advertised videos. Not totally as expected...but for kids this is what excites them...the LOL series. Just wish Amazon would do better where customer service and products are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Regine

customer_reviews.title: Bath bomb alert!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas! She LOVES IT! The clam shell is just covered in the bath bomb stuff- don’t worry the bathbomb part isn’t really that big!! I was a little worried when I saw the size of the clam shell bathbomb. But it’s just enough of the stuff to cover the shell. Haha I don’t think there was a strong scent to it if anyone is sensitive to smell. And it came with a matching big/ little sister with two outfits and shoes and one water bottle for the doll. Either way. Good buy, and my daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: ABS

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Though its a cute experience thats all it is. The little pieces are so tiny no normal child would be able to keep up with them. This was our 2nd bigger LOL surprise and itll probably be our last. Price point is too high for what your left with.
customer_reviews.author: Trisstin Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the creepiest toys. This is one of them!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand LOL dolls and the imagine of my niece dressed up as one for Halloween still gives me nightmares. But just like any other adult, I gave in send bought her what she wanted. My niece loved it and loved the bath components. It was a perfect addition to her LOL doll obsession.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Pate

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a 6th birthday gift for my granddaughter. I thought is was a bit pricy, but she loved it so it was well worth the dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is obsessed with this!
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time, and was exactly as advertised in item description, but I personally, dont see what all the big fuss is about the L.O.L. series dolls, but my daughter seems to be obsessed with them and askes me to buy her "Something" thats L.O.L. every single time we go into the store.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Barr

customer_reviews.title: The girls loved it
customer_reviews.text: I was debating for a couple of days to buy it or not, I’m so glad I pulled the trigger. It was carefully packaged and delivered without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand what the point is and think they are expensive for what you get. But my seven year old neice loved it, so what are you going to do?
customer_reviews.author: BRAMBLES

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Good my daughter loves them. She loses them to easy tho. Seems like a rip of to me. I guess lol stands for lol jokes on you for spending that much on something that belongs in the 50 cent thing out side of the toy store.. Outfits remind me of something the strippers and prostitutes in grand theft auto wear. Seems a little risky for the age group.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor purchase
customer_reviews.text: The doll comes the same in every ball, so theres no surprise at all. The price is too high for only 2 dolls. With the same amount of money I Would bought 2 underwrap and a lil sister. I dont like this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Squealllllllll !!!! Yay.
customer_reviews.text: Well, my granddaughter loved loved loved it- it's the latest cool thing for her and her friends to beg for- not chintzy or cheaply made. Not easy to find in stores. Whatever is in it; she squealed w delite!!!! 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: MAYA PINION

customer_reviews.title: A Hit with Grand daughter!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun gift! My Grand daughter enjoyed finding the mermaid hidden in the egg! A great gift fr a 6 year old little girl who loves LOL surprise dolls and can't get enough of them!
customer_reviews.author: Savedbygrace62

customer_reviews.title: You pay literally for nothing!!
customer_reviews.text: You pay literally for nothing!! I saw so much commercial about these dolls but you pay $30 for huge box , small doll Doesn’t worth $30, I’d pay $5 no more
customer_reviews.author: Shah Richoy

customer_reviews.title: Just Meh
customer_reviews.text: The giant fizzball was kind of fun, but the resulting toys are kind of worthless. My niece was underwhelmed and so was I.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking With Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Really expensive for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Of course my granddaughter love this but is soon as the show is dissolved in water and a little toys were discovered it was played with for about 30 minutes. Cost them lotta money for that short of playtime
customer_reviews.author: Cmartin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not sure there are any dolls in this ridiculous waste of money... moon sand and other trash, but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was popular this season and it was nicely put together and the child I got it for was totally excited. She love not only this but all the LOL stuff she got. Was well worth the money just for the smile on her face.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift and my daughter went wild for it. She loved that you have to dissolve the bath bomb type coating in order to get the little doll out. Easy to open lots of surprises and tons of fun worth it to see her so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Gutierrez Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fun at an expense
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves any and everything L.O.L. She loves that the are diverse and she can find dolls that have skin like her. She also loves the surprise element. She had so much fun with the pearl fizz.
customer_reviews.author: Talarah Burson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or the cleaning after.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these dolls. Its just as small as the $10 and the small $5 balls, but you pay $30. It is MESSY!!! It leaves a nasty chalky mess...dont do this indoors or on a surface you dont want to scrub after the fizz. As my 6 year old said, this was a fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First and last...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my little one. Thankfully, she'll be out of this lol phase by her bday. They are not worth the money. You don't get a lot. Little one better enjoy this one cuz that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: A total waist of money. It comes with 1 little doll and one big. For the size of the container I expected alot more to be in it. You'd be better off buying 3 of the bug sister $10 balls then spending your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Super fun🤗
customer_reviews.text: OMG more than I expected, loved the experience the girl had, the bath bomb was very fizzy and it smelled good. In the picture the doll still have the residue of the bath bomb sorry about that😏 but there so cute! Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Z Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Got the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have with this toy is the bath bomb. YUCK smells super fake and chemically, and the waste of resources used to wrap all the little things a million times. But our daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacks mama

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t enjoy surprises
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loved this and that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened the full product yet, it is for my granddaughter however, the handle came in the package broken, I do not have enough time to send it back for a new one. Upset but at this point nothing can be done
customer_reviews.author: zary

customer_reviews.title: Cute !
customer_reviews.text: This whole thing was a Birthday hit!! She literally screamed. Lots of cute stuff in there. You get six clothing items, 2 dolls and a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: MaidenStull

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit, as! always
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible to review this item badly? The kid went nuts. Once again unwrapped it for me - I was way slow. Showed me all wonderful bits & pieces. Lined the little trolls, er, dolls up with their friends and was lost in a world of her own.
customer_reviews.author: JST

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but a but pricey, especially if you lose pieces.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this and she absolutely loved it. I waited to review and my only complaint is that she loses pieces so would be nice if it came with a little storage box for small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed when I saw them in the store cheaper! However it was what the grandkids requested and they were happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing was huge. Biggest bath bomb I've seen yet. My niece loved it. Be sure to read all the instructions prior to playing with it-- it is NOT to be used in the bathtub or sink!
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my niece and she is extremely happy. The doll comes in a colorful bomb that you have to put under the water. It can be messy, but it's great for little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenchen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe i paid that much for a cheap plastic toy covered in alka seltzer.
customer_reviews.author: A1shopper

customer_reviews.title: Biggest ripoff
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got two for Christmas and guess what?!? They're the same LOL! And all all the "pieces" are dumb little things like sunglasses and stuff. And so darn much packaging
customer_reviews.author: D. Dahlbeck

customer_reviews.title: Plastic overload
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece. Didn't realize how much wasted plastic there is with this and how expensive it is for something so simple. She likes it though so that's what counts I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Alot of money for not a whole lot, but...I knew that before I bought it. Half the gift was just the anticipation and unboxing of everything. Worth every penny to me. My girls loved it!
customer_reviews.author: hatch713

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: The smile on my granddaughter's face when she opened the package was priceless, she did not think she would get one for Christmas, all of the local stores in this area were sold out. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Fluegel

customer_reviews.title: Prefect gift for that special little girl!
customer_reviews.text: OF course my niece liked liked liked her lol ball. I shipped it right to her and she enjoyed every minute of receiving it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: She loved this. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my niece for her 6th birthday. She loved this. Well made, no complaints from parents.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. I don’t think it’s worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best LOL gift
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a baby & a normal size that both change colors in ice water versus warm water. Keeps my girls busy for hours & the container turns into a water bowl for playing
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced crap
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. A big waste of plastic. My daughter opened it, played with it for 5 minutes and then is went in the junk pile.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: Would never buy again because you don’t get much in it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Siegman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LOL
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this set! LOL lovers this is a must, your kids won’t be disappointed! It’s like a giant bath bomb that is not recommended in the bath) but fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Parrotgoddess

customer_reviews.title: LOL
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Over rated. Two little toys inside... fun for like 4 mins. Better to just get the individual balls
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Same doll in these.  No difference if you buy several.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of each color to give my daughter not realizing they are all the same doll. Now I have a brand new sealed Pearl Style 2 and can’t return it. If you purchase just buy one of each.
customer_reviews.author: majvanmeter

customer_reviews.title: Easy shopping.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked was seeing my granddaughter as happy as can be opening her birthday gift. It was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Every single one of these purple seashells has the same exact doll in it. For the price you can buy three regular dolls and my daughter would’ve been more happy
customer_reviews.author: Karalee Greenawald

customer_reviews.title: My niece said that’s it ?  When we opened it so it a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to see what all the fuss is about 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Raisa

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these dolls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores these dolls. She is 6 years old. She loved letting the shell dissolve and then opening it. I did my research and discovered all of the Purple Pearl Surprise kits have the same doll. If you want a different doll, you will have to buy the blue Pearl Surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Rasaan

customer_reviews.title: Best Present
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter and nieces screamed with delight when they opened their presents on Christmas. Made me feel good for having picked these for them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Taibi

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun toy. My daughter was really excited about this and it didn’t disappoint. She loved watching it dissolve and loves her LOL surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ridiculous though! Paying for all that packaging and the brand. Toy is so small, there is no point in having them. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fake not sure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said it was fake... But look close to the ones she got at best buy... My granddaughter was happy so I guess its good... The hair does smell funny though
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! My granddaughter absolutely loved it! Totally not worth the cost of a few pieces of plastic but so worth the delight in her face!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it but warning, it’s the same dolls in every one!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it! However, she’s five and didn’t know that the dolls inside were all the same. So to her this was the best thing in the world which was the goal! I really wish it had a “surprise” to it though. Good thing I didn’t buy two!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Very small parts so be careful and don’t lose
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loved it small parts verrry small she don’t even have half them now because there so small one u lose them good luck finding them small pieces The fizz bomb stained my brown cabinets white lol but that’s fine it was my idea to have her do it in the sink .... the big shell is cool to keep things in there for all her toys
customer_reviews.author: shantelle

customer_reviews.title: Saved me time at Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loved it. It was nice to avoid the holiday rush and have it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Wilson

customer_reviews.title: extremely upset with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY PISSED. I thought there was going to be a doll in this order, and there wasn’t. For $50, there should of been, or it should be notated before ordered. Quality was good, as it was packed nicely and nothing was damaged. However, the doll is the main thing the children want.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha orsino

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: Girls love it! The item is too pricey, but to hear my granddaughter squeal with delight was priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Pat dry

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Got this for my 8 yr old daughter who is crazy for L.O. L. dolls. The container is great for keeping them picked up and away from the dogs!
customer_reviews.author: William Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Genuine product, made my daughter screech when she got it for birthday
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my little niece. She loves LOL and it was the perfect gift for her
customer_reviews.author: rosa maria

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought for my daughters fourth birthday. She flipped. We are the greatest parents ever. All is right in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome my daughter has been begging she was so excited when it came in n 2 day delivery with prime
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was so excited when she saw this. She loved watching in suspense as the toy emerged from its fizzing bath. So cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd's Girl

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter asked for it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wanted it for Christmas and I bought it. I got to see a picture of her being happy with it. That is all i know.
customer_reviews.author: mms.crazy

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for what little it includes.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter. She has enjoyed playing with it. Thought it was a bit overpriced when it was opened and I saw contents.
customer_reviews.author: C. George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Perfect gift I had been hunting for!
customer_reviews.author: shawna renee

product_meta.title: L.O.L. Surprise! Pearl Style 2 Unwrapping Toy
product_meta.description: L.O.L. Surprise offers more unboxing surprises with the L.O.L. Surprise Pearl surprise. Discover shimmery, Pearl surprises inside with rare, limited edition dolls and accessories!
feature_bullets: Limited edition Doll and Lil Sister
Glitter case becomes purse, storage case and bath playset; Note Fizz is not for bathtub use
To prevent overflow, fill with water below the line of bubbles inside the container; Material: Plastic
Don't touch the fizz until it has dissolved, or it will temporarily color your hands
